description: This file provides utility functions for reading and writing JSON files, including a custom JSON encoder to handle datetime, date, and Path objects.

classes.name: CustomJSONEncoder
classes.description: A custom JSON encoder that serializes datetime, date, and Path objects into JSON-compatible formats.

methods.name: read_json_file
methods.description: Reads a JSON file from the given Path object and returns the parsed data as a dictionary or list, or None if the file does not exist.

methods.name: write_json_file
methods.description: Writes data (dict or list) to a JSON file at the specified Path, using the custom encoder for special object types.
